**12.1**
```{r}
Five_top_names <- BabyNames %>%
  group_by(sex, name) %>%
  summarise(total=sum(count)) %>%
  filter(rank(desc(total)) <= 5)
Five_top_names
```
**12.2**
```{r}
Portion<-
  BabyNames %>%
  group_by(year, name) %>%
  summarise(total = sum(count)) %>%
  mutate(Frac10 = ifelse(rank(desc(total)) <= 100, "True", "False" )) %>%
  group_by(year, Frac10) %>%
  summarise(total = sum(total))
Portion

```

```{r}

GlyphReady <-
  Portion%>% 
  spread(Frac10, total) %>%
  mutate(Frac10 = True / (True + False))

```

```{r}
ggplot(data = GlyphReady, aes(x = year, y = Frac10)) + geom_point()

```
